title: Botanic man
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Natural history
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Biotic communities
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
description: An amazing 10-part series, tracing the evolution and adaptation of life on earth. The programs take a botanical point of view because it is the plants that form the basis of the energy web which enables life as we know it to exist in this world.
